alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 12:58AM CDT until June 07 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR WESTERN BEAVER AND EASTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 1257 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Turpin to 8 miles southeast of Adams to 8 miles south of Hardesty, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Hooker, Tyrone, Optima, Hardesty, Bryans Corner, Hough, Baker, Adams, Boyd, Turpin and Floris. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
